content.raw:
I think the `ros/atlas_description/robots/CMakeLists.txt` would be a bit more readable with the following patch:
~~~
diff -r 7f3a941b5339 ros/atlas_description/robots/CMakeLists.txt
--- a/ros/atlas_description/robots/CMakeLists.txt	Mon Sep 09 10:12:36 2013 -0700
+++ b/ros/atlas_description/robots/CMakeLists.txt	Mon Sep 09 13:30:55 2013 -0700
@@ -7,9 +7,27 @@
 # compile using xacro
 
 if (HAVE_SANDIA_HAND)
-  set (model_basenames atlas_v3_with_v1_inertia atlas_v3_with_v1_inertia_sandia_hands atlas_v3 atlas_v3_sandia_hands atlas atlas_cpu_lidar atlas_irobot_hands atlas_sandia_hands atlas_sandia_hands_stumps atlas_sandia_hands_cpu_lidar atlas_sandia_hands_stumps_cpu_lidar)
+  set (model_basenames
+       atlas_v3_with_v1_inertia
+       atlas_v3_with_v1_inertia_sandia_hands
+       atlas_v3
+       atlas_v3_sandia_hands
+       atlas
+       atlas_cpu_lidar
+       atlas_irobot_hands
+       atlas_sandia_hands
+       atlas_sandia_hands_stumps
+       atlas_sandia_hands_cpu_lidar
+       atlas_sandia_hands_stumps_cpu_lidar
+      )
 else()
-  set (model_basenames atlas_v3_with_v1_inertia atlas_v3 atlas atlas_cpu_lidar atlas_irobot_hands)
+  set (model_basenames
+       atlas_v3_with_v1_inertia
+       atlas_v3
+       atlas
+       atlas_cpu_lidar
+       atlas_irobot_hands
+      )
 endif()
 
 
~~~
Aside from that it looks good.

I think the ros/atlas_description/robots/CMakeLists.txt would be a bit more readable with the following patch:

diff -r 7f3a941b5339 ros/atlas_description/robots/CMakeLists.txt
--- a/ros/atlas_description/robots/CMakeLists.txt   Mon Sep 09 10:12:36 2013 -0700
+++ b/ros/atlas_description/robots/CMakeLists.txt   Mon Sep 09 13:30:55 2013 -0700
@@ -7,9 +7,27 @@
 # compile using xacro

 if (HAVE_SANDIA_HAND)
-  set (model_basenames atlas_v3_with_v1_inertia atlas_v3_with_v1_inertia_sandia_hands atlas_v3 atlas_v3_sandia_hands atlas atlas_cpu_lidar atlas_irobot_hands atlas_sandia_hands atlas_sandia_hands_stumps atlas_sandia_hands_cpu_lidar atlas_sandia_hands_stumps_cpu_lidar)
+  set (model_basenames
+       atlas_v3_with_v1_inertia
+       atlas_v3_with_v1_inertia_sandia_hands
+       atlas_v3
+       atlas_v3_sandia_hands
+       atlas
+       atlas_cpu_lidar
+       atlas_irobot_hands
+       atlas_sandia_hands
+       atlas_sandia_hands_stumps
+       atlas_sandia_hands_cpu_lidar
+       atlas_sandia_hands_stumps_cpu_lidar
+      )
 else()
-  set (model_basenames atlas_v3_with_v1_inertia atlas_v3 atlas atlas_cpu_lidar atlas_irobot_hands)
+  set (model_basenames
+       atlas_v3_with_v1_inertia
+       atlas_v3
+       atlas
+       atlas_cpu_lidar
+       atlas_irobot_hands
+      )
 endif()

Aside from that it looks good.
